name: The Fiend's Tavern
description: The Fiend's Tavern, is a tavern management game, where you can purchase upgrades and help various customers, to keep your tavern alive.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7 Processor: Intel Celeron CPU N3350 @1.10GHz or equivalent Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 500 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 700 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 10 Processor: AMD FX-8320 3.50 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 200 Series Storage: 700 MB available space
